item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

07/04/2011 location - Anna Liffeys'

Anna Liffey's is a charming old Irish Pub in Downtown New Haven.  Located on Whitney Avenue, just after it changes over from Church Street, with a big old Irish Flag out front.  Don't be deceived if you don't see anyone in the window, a lot of the time the fun is in the downstairs bar.

We haven't been to Anna Liffey's in several months, so that thought that the 4th of July would be a good time.  A couple people asked that happy hour be outside of the immediate downtown, and closer to East Rock in case they wanted to slip out to see the fireworks, so Anna Liffey's seemed like a good place.

If you wish, you may look at their website... (linked).

Your contact/host is Devorah, call or texting is fine (# in RSVP).  I recommend texting though as Cell phone reception inside Anna Liffey's is often elusive.

Please RSVP for this event to give them an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: We're probably one of if not the largest groups of people at the bar on a Monday. You can also Call/look for the "Contact/host" (Devorah in this case), cell phone number listed below.
item.name: Happy Hour - Anna Liffey's
